name: Figma Finder
description:
Figma Finder is a launcher utility plugin.

It gives you quick access to all your essential things.


- Accessing pages, layers, views, and much quickly

- Browsing your figmaâ€™s Layers broad using keywords matching.


ðŸš€Launcher feature


Add Frame:

1. Select a frame you want to save to the launcher

2. Enter a name in the input field at the bottom of the plugin and press the Add button.


Add View

1. Move to the position you want to save to the launcher.

2. Enter a name in the input field at the bottom of the plugin and press the Add button.


ðŸ”ŽSpotlight feature

- Enter a keyword in the search box, and the layers that match the keyword will be listed.

- When you select a search result item, you will be moved to the location of the layer of that item.


Developed with reference to ViewFinder.

Thanks for the great idea @ahmedmigo(Ahmed Genaidy)
